Minh Tu Tran
Customer Success Executive     |     Saigon, Vietnam     |     +84913019999
 PROFILE
Service-oriented Customer Success bringing the solid history of accurately processing 
payments and resolving customer concerns. Excellent people skills with positive and upbeat 
nature. Effectively build customer loyalty with fast and friendly service.
DETAILS
Saigon, 
Vietnam

EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
Customer Success Executive at KMS Technology (Vietnam 
Branch, Ho Chi Minh City
Sep 2018 - Apr 2019
•
Reached out to customers to assess satisfaction, discuss concerns, and highlight additional 
offerings.
•
Performed budget management duties and coordinated public relations programs
•
Define and finalize the Customer Support process to integrate with the Product team.
•
Act as the point of contact for the Corporate Branding team and the Product team.
Achievements:
•
Successfully deploy the pilot launch in Vietnam Office (1000 staff): 70% activation rate, 35% 
Weekly active users.
•
Build a Help center for users self-service using Zendesk
Customer Experience and Payment Specialist at Agoda Ltd 
(Thailand), Bangkok
Sep 2017 - Sep 2018
•
Met and exceeded call speed, accuracy and volume benchmarks on a consistent basis.
•
Maintained revenue streams by exhausting every option before offering refunds on 
escalated calls.
•
Collected customer feedback and recommended procedural or product changes to enhance 
future service delivery.
•
Documented conversations with customers in Avaya and Genesys to track requests, 
problems and solutions offered.
Achievements:
•
Maintain KPIs at 3.5/5. Customer satisfaction and resolution rate  : >90%.
•
The number of cases resolved daily: 35  with  100% accuracy.
Digital Marketing Executive at KMS Technology (Vietnam 
Branch), Ho Chi Minh City
May 2017 - Aug 2017
•
Planned, implemented and maintained successful SEO strategies.
•
Completed in-depth analyses of competitor ad, keyword, bids and landing page activities.
•
Monitored metrics such as redirects, click and bounce rates and other KPIs to proactively 
optimize campaigns.
SKILLS
Customer Service
Microso� office
Property Management 
So�ware
Digital Marketing Tools
LANGUAGES
Vietnamese
English
Operation executive at AirMe (SMAAP Ltd), Ho Chi Minh City
Nov 2016 - Apr 2019
•
 Maintain and ensure smooth operations between platforms  ( Mobile and Web App)
•
Supporting cabin crews with orders and deliver top-notch customer services: answered 
order placement calls, responded to customer inquiries and addressed with appropriate 
manners.
•
  Prepare financial projection for the fiscal year 2017 and 2018. 
•
Maintained Company data records in compliance with rules and regulations.
•
Responsible for the whole team communication and daily updates; report directly to the 
CEO.
Achievements:
•
3000 monthly active users and 200 active crews
•
Total orders placing value at 20,000 USD
 EDUCATION
Cass Business School, London, United Kingdom
2017
Degree: Master of Science
Brunel University London, London, United Kingdom
2014
Degree: Bachelor of Science
